about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for DOD, composed by Duncan McDougall (me). Featuring all the music I created for the Game including GameOver variations, trailer music and Unique menu theme mix I created specially for you to listen within this soundtrack add on. The music will also be available in a Varity of Audio formats to choose from.

What else can I say. I hope you enjoy the music.
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack for DOD, composed by Duncan McDougall (me). Featuring all the music I created for the Game including GameOver variations, trailer music and Unique menu theme mix I created specially for you to listen within this soundtrack add on. The music will also be available in a Varity of Audio formats to choose from.

What else can I say. I hope you enjoy the music.
name: DOD Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space

short_description: DOD is a 2D arcade styled side scrolling platformer where you must complete each level before the time runs out by collecting time cubes and using momentum to complete them fast. The soundtrack features a unique 80s inspired track on each level along with other music I made for the game.
